thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 15 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's share trade remains halted, controlling shareholder plans asset restructuring

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tianjin Tianhai Investment's share trade remains halted, controlling shareholder plans asset restructuring

organizations.name: reuters) - tianjin tianhai investment co ltd

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Tianjin Tianhai Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER HNA TECHNOLOGY GROUP PLANS ASSET RESTRUCTURING THAT INVOLVES THE COMPANY
* SAYS IT AIMS TO DISCLOSE ASSET RESTRUCTURING PLAN BY FEB 15
* SAYS SHARE TRADE REMAINS SUSPENDED Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2r8Xb6x Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
